user_query: I am planning a family vacation to a tropical destination. Can you provide me with a list of recommended healthcare facilities and doctors in that area? Additionally, I would like to know the vaccination requirements for that destination to ensure the safety of my family. Finally, I need assistance with email marketing services to promote our travel packages. Please suggest the best email marketing programs available.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of recommended healthcare facilities and doctors in the specified tropical destination.
Gather information on vaccination requirements for travelers to the specified tropical destination.
Identify and recommend the best email marketing programs for promoting travel packages.
